lcIntro.p: This document contains examples of interactions (questions and answers) that use the original DITA 1.2 learning domain.

lcSingleSelect.lcQuestion: The spinner below is divided into 8 equal sections. Xavier spins the pointer. A round spinner divided into 8 wedges, labeled clockwise from the top: yellow, red, red, yellow, blue blue, red, blue. What is the probability that the pointer will land on yellow?

lcAnswerOption.lcFeedback: There are 8 wedges, two of which are yellow. Thus the probability is: 2 — 8
